property.caption: Weglot API key
property.description: You can find the api key on the setup page in the weglot dashboard

property.caption: Cache languages?
property.description: Setting this to true greatly improves user experience by caching Weglot's translations into your visitors' browser. Translations are kept up-to-date asynchronously

property.caption: Hide Weglot switcher?
property.description: This can be useful when you want to create your own custom switcher or don't want a switcher at all

property.caption: Default language
property.description: Specify the language to use on first load. Leave empty for Weglot's default language. Use the 2-letter format (e.g., 'en')
